edu.performance.test.database

Class DatabaseOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.performance.test.PerformanceTest<java.lang.Integer>
      • edu.performance.test.database.DatabaseOperation

  • public class DatabaseOperation
extends PerformanceTest<java.lang.Integer>
    This class extends PerformanceTest and it executes operations with database SQLite. Currently this operations are - insertion - select - delete - update
    Author:
    Thiago

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseOperation(Library application)
      Initializes the DBAdapter with application context and makes possible get application references.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        This method calls methods to perform operation of insertion(Lists and Tasks), selection (Lists and Tasks), update (only tasks) and delete (Lists and Tasks). Here the level determines the number of operations which will be executed.
        Specified by:
        execute in class PerformanceTest<java.lang.Integer>

      • testAaddLists

        private void testAaddLists(int level)
        This method performs the operation of Lists insertion. The number of insertions is defined by level.
        Parameters:
        level - Determines how many operations will be executed

      • testAgetTasks

        private Cursor testAgetTasks(java.lang.String level)
        This method performs the operation of Lists selection. The number of selected lines is defined by level.
        Parameters:
        level - Determines how many operations will be executed

      • testAgetLists

        private Cursor testAgetLists(java.lang.String level)
        This method performs the operation of Lists selection. The number of selected lines is defined by level.
        Parameters:
        level - Determines how many operations will be executed

      • testAaddTasks

        private void testAaddTasks(int level)
        This method performs the operation of Tasks insertion. The number of insertions is defined by level.
        Parameters:
        level - Determines how many operations will be executed

      • testAdeleteTasks

        private void testAdeleteTasks(Cursor mCursor)
        This method performs the operation of tasks deletion.The number of deletions is defined by level.
        Parameters:
        mCursor - This parameter contain all tasks added in database

      • testAdeleteLists

        private void testAdeleteLists(Cursor mCursor)
        This method performs the operation of lists deletion. The number of deletions is defined by level.
        Parameters:
        mCursor - This parameter contain all lists added in database

      • testAupdateTasks

        private void testAupdateTasks(Cursor mCursor)
        This method performs the operation of lists update. The number of updated lists is defined by level.
        Parameters:
        mCursor - This parameter contain all lists added in database
